title: The suruay or topographical description of France with a new mappe, helping greatly for the surueying of euery particular country, cittye, fortresse, riuer, mountaine, and forrest therein: collected out of sundry approued authors: very amply, truly, and historically digested, for the pleasure of those who desire to be throughly acquainted in the state of the kingdome & dominion of France.
author: Eliot, John.
publicationStmtPublisher: Imprinted by Iohn Wolfe, and are to bee sold at his shop at Poules chayne,
